ValidationRule.description: When moving status from Henvist to Initiell kontakt/kartlegging without startDate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Oppstartsdato__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(ips_Status__c),"Referred"), OR( ISPICKVAL(ips_Status__c,"Mapping"), ISPICKVAL(ips_Status__c,"Initial contact") ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='IPS', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ips_Supported_Employment') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Kreves en oppstartsdato for Ã¥ sette den i neste status.
